text: Joan of Arcadia was a CBS drama television series. It starred Amber Tamblyn. Tamblyn's character was Joan Girardi, a teenager with the ability to talk to God. In its second season, the show had 8.5 million viewers per episode. However, after declining ratings the show was canceled. A third season was never made. Category:Fantasy television series Category:2003 television series debuts Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: Joan of Arcadia
